doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff

Pride and Progress [New Years Review of 1985]News-highlights:1. "Times of Harvey Milk" wins academy award, includes clipCOMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity with Jack Albertson2. Phil Donahue wins award The Arthur Bell Award at The Human Rights Campaign Fund Dinner, includes clip3. Virginia Apuzzo resigns as director of National Gay Task Force, includes clip4. The American Civil Liberties Union discusses gay community's privacy rights5. New York City Democratic Gay Rally coverage, Mayor Ed Koch speaks6. 1985 Gay Pride AIDS Memorial Candlelight Service7. Barry Davidson, Director of Information for GMHC and Richard Dunne, Incoming Director of GMHC, discuss AIDS research and healthy sex7. Harvey Milk School opens, includes clipCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp8. Sports, includes clip9. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Doris Taussig, Volunteer for GMHC, discusses involvement in gay community10. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: The Monster2. Sybil Bruncheon and healthy sex calendarCOMMERCIAL: The Grande Gala-Gay, The Islanders' Club3. Current events/media/culture, includes clipsCOMMERCIAL: AIDS hotline, New York AIDS Action4. Eye on New York, Chelsea District
